properties.name: user.heartbeat.monitoring.interval
properties.description: Time interval in miliseconds after which the monitoring is done. It is a thread based monitoring, thead runs after every 'user.heartbeat.monitoring.interval'

properties.name: user.tables.refresh.interval
properties.description: Time interval in miliseconds after which all the tables and streams will be refreshed. It is a thread based monitoring, thead runs after every 'user.tables.refresh.interval'

properties.name: user.heartbeat.monitoring.timeDifference
properties.description: The maximum time difference in milliseconds, for which a user is supposed to be online
